name: VR Roller Coaster 3D: 360 Ride
description:
A dynamic 3D ride + 360 degrees angle, vertical and horizontal = an incredible feeling and drive!
VR Roller Coaster: 360 Ride is an exciting environment with your mobile virtual reality headset for any mobile virtual reality headset. Realize yourself in a Train that is running on a Rolling track!

Features:
- VR based 3D Environment
- Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation
- Stunning 3D Graphics
- Real Sound effects
- Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals
- No time Limit, unlimited play and fun

VR Roller Coaster 3D: 360 Ride is compatible with all virtual reality devices :
Homido VR
Archos VR
Dive VR
FreeFly VR
FIBRUM VR
Cmoar
Vrase
Zeiss VR One
Lick VR
